briefdescription.para: Association of AlgebraState (highest weights of irreps) and vector spaces. To each irrep (i.e. each highest weight) is associated a different and unique vector space (csl::Space). See getVectorSpace().

memberdef.argsstring: (SemiSimpleGroup *t_group, Gauge *gauge, std::string const &bosonName, bool addGhost, const csl::Expr &t_coupling)
memberdef.name: GaugedGroup

memberdef.argsstring: (QuantumFieldParent &field, const csl::Index &mu, const std::vector< csl::Index > &fieldIndices, csl::Tensor &point)=0
memberdef.name: covariantDerivative
